name: Chicken Produced All/鸡生万物ClickerGame
description:
Click the egg and make it hatch!

Eggs will be generated every 10 seconds.

Collect adorable creatures, and welcome to leave a comment and tell us how many animals you collected when you lose interest in clicking. 

Credits:

Programmer: Lucas Qu

Designer: Wendy Hu

Art assets:

Eggs by Onocentaur (itch.io)

Sprite Pack 4 by GrafxKid (itch.io)

2D Pixel Art Fox Sprites by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop (itch.io)

Dino Character Sprites by Arks💢 (itch.io)

20 Logo Templates with customizable PSD vector sources | 2D Icons | Unity Asset Store
